en.title: Divorce application

tooLateToRespond.heading: Contact the Courts and Tribunals Service Centre
tooLateToRespond.info: You can no longer respond to this application online. Contact the service Centre to find out what to do next.

notDefending.heading: You have submitted your response
notDefending.info: Your response will be checked and you’ll be contacted about what you need to do next.

defendingAwaitingAnswer.heading: You need to submit your answer
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para1: You must now submit the 'answer to a divorce application' form. The deadline for the court to receive this is 21 days from the date that you first signed in to respond to the application.
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para2: Download and fill in the paper form.
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para4: You’ll have to pay a £{{ feesDefendDivorce }} fee when you submit the form.
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para5: You may have to go to a hearing.
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para6: If you don’t submit your answer before the deadline, the applicant will be able to continue the divorce as if you hadn’t said that you intended to defend it.

defendingSubmittedAnswer.heading: Your answer has been received by the court
defendingSubmittedAnswer.para1: Your ‘answer’ to the divorce application has been received by the court.
defendingSubmittedAnswer.para2: The court will now decide whether you will need to attend a hearing. You may be contacted for more information to help make that decision.
defendingSubmittedAnswer.para3: If you do need to attend a hearing, you’ll be sent a letter in the post telling you when and where the hearing is.

awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.title: The application for a decree nisi has been accepted
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.districtJudge: A district judge will formally announce the decree nisi at a court hearing. This is the first stage of the decree ending the marriage.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.orderPayDivorceCosts: The court has also decided to make an order that you pay towards the divorce costs.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.divorceOnlyComplete: The divorce is only complete when the decree absolute has been granted.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.findMoreDetails: You can find more details about the date of the hearing and the orders that will be made (including costs orders) in the Certificate Of Entitlement ({{ certificateOfEntitlementFile.fileType | upper }}).
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.wantToObject: You don’t need to come to the hearing unless you want to object to the costs order.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.attendTheHearing: If you want to attend the hearing, you need to email the court before the hearing date.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.attendTheHearingCosts: If you want to dispute a costs order, the court must receive a letter or email stating the reasons for doing so at least 14 days before the hearing date.

decreeNisiGranted.heading: The decree nisi has been granted
decreeNisiGranted.dateGranted: On {{ session.originalPetition.decreeNisiGrantedDate | date }} the court granted a:
decreeNisiGranted.decreeNisi: decree nisi - the first stage of the decree ending the marriage
decreeNisiGranted.costsOrder: costs order - giving your applicant the right to claim their divorce costs from you
decreeNisiGranted.whatCostsOrder: What to do with the costs order
decreeNisiGranted.costOrderDetails: The order will state what the court has decided you must pay the applicant. You are required to pay them within 14 days of the order being made. If you don’t pay within that time, the applicant can use the order to make a civil money claim against you.
decreeNisiGranted.downloadCostsOrder: Download your costs order ({{ costsOrderFile.fileType | upper }}).

en.helpContent: You can contact the service centre if you need help. Court staff can’t give you legal advice however, and you should speak to a solicitor or legal adviser.
en.improveContent: Please help us improve this service by leaving your feedback.

cy.title: Cais am ysgariad

tooLateToRespond.heading: Cysylltu â Chanolfan Wasanaeth y Llysoedd a’r Tribiwnlysoedd
tooLateToRespond.info: Ni allwch ymateb i’r cais hwn ar-lein mwyach. Cysylltu â’r Ganolfan Wasanaeth i gael gwybod beth i’w wneud nesaf.

notDefending.heading: Rydych wedi cyflwyno eich ymateb
notDefending.info: Byddwn yn gwirio eich ymateb ac yn cysylltu â chi i egluro beth sydd angen ichi ei wneud nesaf.

defendingAwaitingAnswer.heading: Mae angen ichi gyflwyno ateb
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para1: Yn awr rhaid ichi gyflwyno ffurflen 'ateb i gais am ysgariad'. Rhaid i’r llys dderbyn hon o fewn 21 diwrnod i’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch fewngofnodi gyntaf i ymateb i’r cais.
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para2: Llwytho ffurflen bapur i lawr a’i llenwi.
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para4: Bydd rhaid i chi dalu ffi o £{{ feesDefendDivorce }} pan fyddwch yn cyflwyno’r ffurflen.
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para5: Efallai y bydd rhaid ichi fynd i wrandawiad.
defendingAwaitingAnswer.para6: Os na fyddwch yn cyflwyno eich ateb mewn pryd, bydd y ceisydd yn gallu bwrw ymlaen â’r ysgariad fel pe baech heb ddweud eich bod yn bwriadu ei amddiffyn.

defendingSubmittedAnswer.heading: Mae’r llys wedi derbyn eich ateb
defendingSubmittedAnswer.para1: Mae’r llys wedi derbyn eich ‘ateb’ i’r cais am ysgariad.
defendingSubmittedAnswer.para2: Bydd y llys yn awr yn penderfynu a fydd gofyn ichi fynychu gwrandawiad. Efallai y byddir yn cysylltu â chi i gael mwy o wybodaeth cyn gwneud y penderfyniad hwnnw.
defendingSubmittedAnswer.para3: Os bydd gofyn ichi fynychu gwrandawiad, byddwch yn cael llythyr drwy’r post yn eich hysbysu ynglyn ag amser a lleoliad y gwrandawiad.

awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.title: Mae eich cais am ddyfarniad nisi wedi cyrraedd ein swyddfa
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.districtJudge: Bydd Barnwr Rhanbarth yn cyhoeddi’r dyfarniad nisi yn ffurfiol mewn gwrandawiad llys. Dyma gam cyntaf y dyfarniad fydd yn dod â’ch priodas i ben.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.orderPayDivorceCosts: Mae’r llys wedi penderfynu gwneud gorchymyn ichi dalu tuag at gostau’r ysgariad.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.divorceOnlyComplete: Nid yw’r ysgariad yn gyflawn nes y gwneir y dyfarniad absoliwt.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.findMoreDetails: Gallwch gael mwy o fanylion am ddyddiad y gwrandawiad a’r gorchmynion y byddir yn eu gwneud (yn cynnwys gorchmynion costau) yn y Dystysgrif Hawl ({{ certificateOfEntitlementFile.fileType | upper }}).
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.wantToObject: Nid oes angen i chi ddod i’r gwrandawiad oni bai eich bod am wrthwynebu’r gorchymyn costau.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.attendTheHearing: Os ydych eisiau mynychu’r gwrandawiad, bydd angen ichi anfon neges e-bost i’r llys cyn dyddiad y gwrandawiad.
awaitingPronouncementHearingDate.attendTheHearingCosts: Os ydych eisiau gwrthwynebu gorchymyn costau, rhaid i’r llys gael llythyr neu neges e-bost yn nodi’r rhesymau dros wneud hynny o leiaf 14 diwrnod cyn dyddiad y gwrandawiad.

decreeNisiGranted.heading: Rhoddwyd y dyfarniad nisi
decreeNisiGranted.decreeNisi: ddyfarniad nisi - dyma gam cyntaf y dyfarniad fydd yn dod â’r briodas i ben
decreeNisiGranted.costsOrder: gorchymyn costau - sy’n rhoi’r hawl i’r ceisydd hawlio costau’r ysgariad gennych
decreeNisiGranted.whatCostsOrder: Beth i’w wneud gyda’r gorchymyn costau
decreeNisiGranted.costOrderDetails: Bydd y gorchymyn yn nodi faint mae’r llys wedi penderfynu y bydd rhaid ichi dalu i’r ceisydd. Bydd rhaid ichi dalu o fewn 14 diwrnod i ddyddiad y gorchymyn. Os na fyddwch yn talu o fewn y cyfnod hwnnw, gall y ceisydd  ddefnyddio’r gorchymyn i wneud hawliad am arian yn eich erbyn.
decreeNisiGranted.downloadCostsOrder: Llwytho eich gorchymyn costau i lawr ({{ costsOrderFile.fileType | upper }}).

cy.helpContent: Os ydych angen cymorth, gallwch gysylltu â’r ganolfan ysgaru. Fodd bynnag, ni all staff y llys roi cyngor cyfreithiol ichi, a dylech siarad â chyfreithiwr neu gynghorydd cyfreithiol.
cy.improveHeading: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn
cy.improveContent: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn drwy gynnig sylwadau ar y gwasanaeth.
